title: I didn't play for a while. What happened to jungle?
body:
I always pick fill, with the logic behind it that all my teammates can get their preferred role, thus if I suck, the chance of them carrying is higher.

That would usually result in me being perma support.

Now I didn't play for a while (a couple months during preseasons mostly) and I just got filled into jungle 3 times.
Why is it so unpopular? It doesnt feel like it changed even a bit apart from XP gain. Is the burden of securing drakes now scaring people? What happened?
